name: Homebrew
commands: /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)"
brew update

name: Oh My Zsh
commands: sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)"
brew list zsh-syntax-highlighting-code &>/dev/null || brew install zsh-syntax-highlighting
git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions
git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting
npm install --global pure-prompt

name: Fira Code Font
commands: brew tap homebrew/cask-fonts
brew list font-fira-code &>/dev/null || brew install font-fira-code --cask

name: Lazy Git
commands: brew install jesseduffield/lazygit/lazygit
brew install lazygit

name: Brew Applications
commands: brew list google-chrome &>/dev/null || brew install google-chrome --cask
brew list alfred &>/dev/null || /brew install alfred --cask
brew list iterm2 &>/dev/null || brew install iterm2 --cask
brew list adobe-creative-cloud &>/dev/null || brew install adobe-creative-cloud --cask
brew list sync &>/dev/null || brew install sync --cask
brew list 1password &>/dev/null || brew install 1password  --cask
brew list visual-studio-code &>/dev/null || brew install visual-studio-code  --cask
brew list spotify &>/dev/null || brew install spotify  --cask
brew list notion &>/dev/null || brew install notion  --cask
brew list gitkraken &>/dev/null || brew install gitkraken  --cask
brew list keka &>/dev/null || brew install keka  --cask
brew list sip &>/dev/null || brew install sip
brew list vlc &>/dev/null || brew install vlc  --cask
brew list rambox &>/dev/null || brew install rambox  --cask
brew list firefox &>/dev/null || brew install firefox  --cask
brew list microsoft-teams &>/dev/null || brew install microsoft-teams  --cask
brew list middle &>/dev/null || brew install middle  --cask
brew list keepingyouawake &>/dev/null || brew install keepingyouawake  --cask
brew list microsoft-teams &>/dev/null || brew install microsoft-teams --cask
brew list slack &>/dev/null || brew install slack --cask
brew list whatsapp &>/dev/null || brew install whatsapp --cask
brew list messenger &>/dev/null || brew install messenger --cask
brew list ableton-live-suite &>/dev/null || brew install ableton-live-suite --cask
brew list shottr &>/dev/null || install shottr --cask
brew list private-internet-access &>/dev/null || brew install private-internet-access --cask
brew list karabiner-elements &>/dev/null || brew install karabiner-elements --cask
brew install mas
